name: li

scripts.test: tape 'tests/**/*-test.js' | node tests/save-test-results.js | node tools/clean-tap-output.js | tap-spec; node tests/warnings.js
scripts.test:reports: node tests/run-report-tests.js | node tests/save-test-results.js | node tools/clean-tap-output.js | tap-spec; node tests/warnings.js
scripts.test:unit: tape 'tests/unit/**/*-test.js' | node tests/save-test-results.js | node tools/clean-tap-output.js | tap-spec; node tests/warnings.js
scripts.test:integration: tape 'tests/integration/**/*-test.js' | node tests/save-test-results.js | node tools/clean-tap-output.js | tap-spec; node tests/warnings.js
scripts.migration:report: npm --silent run migration:status -- report | pbcopy && echo 'Copied to clipboard'
scripts.migration:summary: npm --silent run migration:status -- summary | pbcopy && echo 'Copied to clipboard'

humans: All root deps are considered dev dependencies
author: Ryan Block <hello@ryanblock.com>
